content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'WAS':
content.explanation: En esta oración, usamos 'was' para formar el pasado continuo junto con el verbo en -ing.
content.stimulus_en:
I (read) a book when the phone rang.

I was reading ...
content.correct_answer: a book when the phone rang.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'WERE':
content.explanation: Aquí utilizamos 'were' para formar el pasado continuo con un sujeto plural.
content.stimulus_en:
They (play) soccer when it started to rain.

They were playing ...
content.correct_answer: soccer when it started to rain.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'WAS':
content.explanation: Usamos 'was' para indicar que ella estaba en medio de la acción de cocinar.
content.stimulus_en:
She (cook) dinner when I arrived.

She was cooking ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'WERE':
content.explanation: Aquí utilizamos 'were' con un sujeto plural para mostrar la acción en progreso.
content.stimulus_en:
We (watch) a movie when the power went out.

We were watching ...
content.correct_answer: a movie when the power went out.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'WAS':
content.explanation: Usamos 'was' para mostrar la acción que estaba ocurriendo en el pasado.
content.stimulus_en:
I (walk) to school when I met my friend.

I was walking ...
content.correct_answer: to school when I met my friend.

content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences using the past continuous form of the verbs in parentheses.
content.explanation: Se usa el past continuous para mostrar una acción en progreso en el pasado.
content.stimulus_en:
Fill in each blank with the correct form of the verb in the past continuous.

While I ___ (read) the book, my friend called me.

content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences using the past continuous form of the verbs in parentheses.
content.explanation: El past continuous se utiliza para indicar una acción que estaba en progreso en un momento específico.
content.stimulus_en:
Fill in each blank with the correct form of the verb in the past continuous.

They ___ (watch) a movie when the power went out.

content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences using the past continuous form of the verbs in parentheses.
content.explanation: El uso negativo del past continuous se forma con 'was not' o 'were not' seguido del verbo en -ing.
content.stimulus_en:
Fill in each blank with the correct form of the verb in the past continuous.

I ___ (not/sleep) when the alarm rang.

content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences using the past continuous form of the verbs in parentheses.
content.explanation: El past continuous se usa para describir acciones que estaban en curso mientras ocurría otra acción.
content.stimulus_en:
Fill in each blank with the correct form of the verb in the past continuous.

While she ___ (cook), her friends arrived.

content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences using the past continuous form of the verbs in parentheses.
content.explanation: Usamos el past continuous para mostrar que una acción estaba en progreso cuando ocurrió otra.
content.stimulus_en:
Fill in each blank with the correct form of the verb in the past continuous.

We ___ (play) football when it started to rain.

content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences by filling in the blanks with the correct passive voice form.
content.main_text:
The book ___ (write) by a famous author.

The song ___ (sing) at the concert last night.

The painting ___ (sell) to a collector for a large amount.

The project ___ (complete) on time by the team.

The letters ___ (send) yesterday.
content.explanation:
(1) En voz pasiva, utilizamos 'was' + participio pasado. Aquí, 'write' se convierte en 'written'.
(2) Usamos 'was' porque la acción ocurrió en el pasado y 'sing' se convierte en 'sung' en participio pasado.
(3) El participio pasado de 'sell' es 'sold'. Usamos 'was' para indicar que fue vendido en el pasado.
(4) Para formar la voz pasiva, usamos 'was' + participio pasado. 'Complete' se convierte en 'completed'.
(5) Aquí usamos 'were' porque hay varias cartas y el participio pasado de 'send' es 'sent'.
